DOC.brief_summary: Phase II Study of Maintenance Tarceva (Erlotinib) in patients with locally advanced Head and Neck Cancer after treatment with curative intent
DOC.brief_title: Maintenance of Tarceva (Erlotinib) in Patients With Locally Advanced Head and Neck Cancer
DOC.criteria: Stage III, IV SCCHN Completed curative treatment Prior chemotherapy or radiotherapy Recurrent disease
DOC.keyword: squamous cell cancer of head and neck
